text: Briefly , 1x106 cells were stimulated overnight with anti-CD40 antibody ( 10 microg / ml ) or an isotype control antibody , with or without 500 U / ml mouse <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( BD Biosciences ) .
RNA was isolated using Trizol ( Invitrogen ) , and reverse-transcribed ( Superscript III kit , Invitrogen ) .

Quantitative PCR for <extra_id_0> GLepsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> Hprt1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was performed using SYBR GREEN master mix ( Applied Biosystems ) , and an Applied Biosystems 7900HT Fast Real-Time PCR instrument .
Expression of <extra_id_0> GLepsilon <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in each sample was normalized to the expression of <extra_id_0> Hprt1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
